details.title: A Tunable 240–290 GHz Waveguide Enclosed 2-D Grid HBV Frequency Tripler
details.abstract: This paper presents a high-power 240-290 GHz waveguide enclosed two-dimensional (2-D) grid heterostructure barrier varactor (HBV) frequency multiplier. A 35 mW of output power is produced at 247 GHz with an input power of 900 mW. The operational bandwidth is tunable within a 50 GHz span by the use of an input tuner able to adjust the input matching of the 2-D grid HBV frequency multiplier. Tuning is achieved by moving a suspended dielectric slab in the input waveguide.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Terahertz Science and Technology
details.sponsor: IEEE Microwave Theory and Techniques Society

keywords: high-power waveguide enclosed two-dimensional grid heterostructure barrier varactor frequency multiplier
tunable waveguide enclosed 2D grid HBV frequency tripler
